original: Apelskog, Carl Martin, agronom, mejerikonsulent, Skara, f. 22/8/82 i KyrkefaWa, Skarab. 1., av godsäg. Erik A. o. Wilhelmina Carlsson, — Agro-nomex. v. Ultuna lantbr :inst. 08, me-jerikonsulentex. v. Alnarps mejeriinst. 12. Förest, f. lantmrsk. i Jämtl., me-jerikomsu:!’. f. Skarab. 1. 12-42, huv :’lär. v. statens mejerisk. i Blomberg 12-33. Sekr. v. Skarab. 1. hush:sällsk. smör-o. ostprovn. 13-42, sekr. i Skarab. 1. mejerifören. 12-35. Stud. mejerihantering i Danm., Norge o. Tyskl. Init:-tag. t. o. led. av Skarab. 1. mjölkbe-■dömnifören. 18-42. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. Odd Fellow^. Skr.: div. art. rör. mejerihant. i dagspr. o. fack-tidskr. Hobbies: blommor, trädg:-skötsel. Skarab. 1. hush :säll’sk. för-tj :GM, Sv. Mejerikonsul :fören. för-tj:GM.
translated: Apelskog, Carl Martin, agronomist, dairy consultant, Skara, born August 22nd, 1882 in KyrkefaWa, Skaraborg county, son of estate owners Erik A. and Wilhelmina Carlsson. Graduated as an agronomist from Ultuna Agricultural Institute in 1908 and as a dairy consultant from Alnarp Dairy Institute in 1912. He served as head of agriculture in Jämtland county and dairy consultant in Skaraborg county from 1912 to 1942, and was the principal teacher at the state dairy school in Blomberg from 1932 to 1942. He was the secretary of the Skaraborg household society for butter and cheese testing from 1913 to 1942, and the secretary of the Skaraborg dairy association from 1912 to 1935. He studied dairy management in Denmark, Norway, and Germany and initiated the establishment and was a member of the Skaraborg milk quality assessment association from 1918 to 1942. He was a member of the Freemasons and the Odd Fellows fraternal organizations, and he wrote various articles on dairy management in newspapers and trade journals. His hobbies were flowers and gardening. He received the Swedish Dairy Consultant Association's award for meritorious service, as well as the Skaraborg household society's award.
